About this jobOur NielsenIQ Technology teams are working on our new “Discover” platform, a unified, global, open data ecosystem powered by Microsoft Azure. Our clients around the world rely on NielsenIQ’s data and insights to innovate and grow. As a Senior Software Engineer, you’ll be part of a team of smart, highly skilled technologists who are passionate about learning and prototyping cutting-edge technologies. Right now our platform is based in Angular, JAVA, Spring Boot, Mongo, Postgres and Snowflake, and we continue to adopt the best of breed in cloud-native, low-latency technologies. We value CI/CD in everything that we develop. Our team is co-located and agile, with central technology hubs in Chicago, Madrid, Toronto, Pune and Chennai.  ResponsibilitiesDesign and develop quality frontend applications 
Write complex, clean and maintainable code to develop scalable user-friendly Front-end applications 
Develop reusable UI components that can serve the needs of multiple applications 
Ensure the maintainability and quality of code 
Integrate code into modern, automated testing and CI/CD pipelines 
Handle configuration management and deployment tasks as needed 5 and above years of relevant software engineering experience 
Strong fundamentals in the software development life cycle (SDLC) process including proficiency in UI/Web front-end frameworks, Angular, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Jasmine and Karma  
Familiarity integrating Restful APIs and an understanding of microservices architecture 
Some experience with frontend design and solution architecture 
Excellent English communication skills, with the ability to effectively interface across cross-functional technology teams and the business  
Sound SDLC skills, preferably with experience in an agile environment 
Minimum B.S. degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field About NIQNIQ is the world’s leading consumer intelligence company, delivering the most complete understanding of consumer buying behavior and revealing new pathways to growth. In 2023, NIQ combined with GfK, bringing together the two industry leaders with unparalleled global reach. With a holistic retail read and the most comprehensive consumer insights—delivered with advanced analytics through state-of-the-art platforms—NIQ delivers the Full View™.NIQ, is an Advent International portfolio company with operations in 100+ markets, covering more than 90% of the world’s population.
